Mike Warren.Action: Playfully challenges Sheryl on music choices, teases her with a grin and a wink.
Dismisses Sheryl's music taste as 'crap' and insists he has better taste.

Confidently selects and recommends music he believes is superior, asserting his good taste.
Fails to recognize or admits to an embarrassing mistake when a song he disparaged is found repeatedly on his playlist.
